description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You take one idea and build upon it, that’s how great games are made; coincidently that’s what Jey and Oli have done with Perlmania. A game that was just scribbled on a napkin now contains 50 levels and a wonderful, colourful design. We want to share our vision with you.  An original puzzler, 50 levels, ether use your brain or just have fun!  Check out www.oliart.co.uk/perlmania!
